segments.text: I glance at the window first; that garden is lovely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, water's flooding from the sink—wow!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's drying dishes, foot in the water, no idea.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Stacked bowls nearby, safe for now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy; he's climbing high on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Reaching into the cookie jar—such a bold move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool's tipping; oh no, careful!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Girl's waiting patiently, arm up high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're teaming up for cookies; adorable mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the wet floor could make everything slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open wide, cookies spilling out maybe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She still hasn't turned; amazing she's so focused.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in a big mess or a laugh.
segments.speaker: PAR
